snippet: Jason Day and Cameron Tringale shot an eight-under-par 64 in modified, alternate-shot play to increase their lead to three strokes at the Franklin Templeton Shootout, a team event in Naples, Fla.
abstract: Jason Day and Cameron Tringale lead Franklin Templeton Shootout golf tournament by three strokes.
lead_paragraph: Jason Day and Cameron Tringale shot an eight-under-par 64 in modified, alternate-shot play to increase their lead to three strokes at the Franklin Templeton Shootout, a team event in Naples, Fla.

headline.main: Jason Day and Cameron Tringale Increase Their Lead
headline.print_headline: Day and Tringale Increase Their Lead
